name: NPR
text:
Prison abolitionist Mariame Kaba: "I imagine a whole generation of young people being born in this moment who are going to grow up understanding that the world doesn't have to be this way. We don't have to have prisons, policing and surveillance."
https://t.co/7UtBecUltX

name: NPR
text:
Author Ijeoma Oluo says white male mediocrity — or "this idea that white men deserve political power and wealth and safety...just because they're white men" — has most greatly impacted women and people of color. 

But she says it's also killing white men. 
https://t.co/IguKsJQsf7

name: NPR
text:
A new study of toddlers in Kenya suggests that having an older sister can have a powerful impact on a child's development — leading to improved early vocabulary and fine motor skills.
https://t.co/YHcfQmyfgK

name: NPR
text: Este and Alana Haim — two-thirds of @HAIMtheband — joined @waitwait to play a game called "You're my Wonderwall": 3 questions about Liam and Noel Gallagher, the brothers behind Oasis. https://t.co/bNHr9bWgAH

name: NPR
text:
New Zealand says it will provide free doses of coronavirus vaccines to its residents as well as neighboring nations Tokelau, Cook Islands, Niue, Samoa, Tonga, and Tuvalu, should they want them.
https://t.co/pgSojFM4i3

name: NPR
text:
For many people, this is the first year they'll spend the holidays away from family. That separation is something the more than 1 million international students studying in the U.S. this year are familiar with.

Here's how they've learned to cope:
https://t.co/3HXF92dV7B

name: NPR
text:
It's been 50 years since Puerto Rican singer José Feliciano first came up with "Feliz Navidad," because he missed his family.

Now, he's recorded a new version with 30 friends — including Lin-Manuel Miranda, Gloria Gaynor, Jason Mraz and La India.
https://t.co/f1oTzB8VAb

name: NPR
text:
This documentary about the 76 days of Wuhan's lockdown isn't just a harrowing tribute to its frontline workers and patients, our reviewer says.

It's a wake-up call for those of us in countries that are still fighting.
https://t.co/DidVGji4gs
